Notely - Speech to Text Converter

Convert speech to text instantly. Perfect for meetings, lectures, and quick notes. Save time with effortless voice typing.

Detailed Description:
Notely turns your voice into text instantly, right in your browser. Simply upload audio file to create notes effortlessly.

Key Features:
- Instant speech-to-text conversion
- Perfect for meetings and lectures
- Simple one-click upload
- No account required
- Privacy-focused

Perfect for:
- Students taking lecture notes
- Professionals in meetings
- Writers and content creators
- Anyone who prefers speaking over typing
- Quick thoughts and ideas
- Meeting minutes and summaries

How to use:
1. Click the Notely icon
2. Upload audio file
3. Your speech appears as text instantly

Notely - Turn speech into text.

Version: 1.0
Language: English

*Note: Daily usage limits may apply to ensure optimal performance and fair usage.*
